original_text: And a great windstorm arose, and the waves were breaking into the boat, so that the boat was already filling.
korean_text: 큰 광풍이 일어나며 물결이 배에 부딪쳐 들어와 배에 가득하게 되었더라

sentences.original_text: and the waves were breaking into the boat
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 파도가 배에 부딪쳐 들어오고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: so that the boat was already filling
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 배는 이미 물에 차고 있었습니다
